description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end and Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope and installation of window to side elevation; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of windows to side elevation; installation of three roof lights to front roof slope.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the above drawings and documents.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed side facing windows within the side wall of the original dwelling and the two side windows proposed to the outrigger extension shall be obscure glazed to a height of 1.7 metres, measured internally.

Reasons: To prevent overlooking and to protect the privacy of the occupants of the neighbouring property, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD. | No part of the roof of the extension, including the area identified as 'green roof' on the proposed plans, shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
